ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do you think he is rightly guided
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Have you thought, if he had been on guidance
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Did you consider: what if he is on the Right Way,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: What will happen if the praying person is rightly guided
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: What is your opinion – if he were upon guidance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Have you seen if he is on the guidance
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Have you considered if he were on the right way,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What thinkest thou? If he were upon guidance
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Hast thou seen if he relieth on the guidance (of Allah)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do you think he is rightly guided,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Bethinkest thou, if he is himself guided,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: tell me, should he be on [true] guidance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Seest thou if he is on (the road of) Guidance?-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Tell me, if he (Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) is on the guidance (of Allah)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Have you seen if he was upon guidance
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do you think he is upon guidance?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Have you seen if he is upon guidance
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [96:11] Have you considered what if he, the one forbidden, should be upon [a path of] guidance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Hast thou seen if he (relieth) on the guidance (of Allah)) i.e. Muhammad (pbuh) is following the guidance: prophethood and Islam
